title: The Love of Siam (2007) DVD9 RETAIL Director's cut
description:
Description
Two boyhood friends are separated due to the disappearance of the sister of one of them, then later meet again as teenagers, when one of them has become a pop singer, and they discover feelings that they did not know they had.


The Love of Siam (2007) - Director's Cut (Thailand)

Country: Thailand
Spoken Language: Thai
Subtitles: English, Traditional Chinese


DVD Details:
Disc 1 - First 2 hours of the film
Disc 2 - Last 50 minutes of the film
Disc 3 - Bonus Features
- Deleted scenes (not included in the Director's cut version of the film)
- Behind the scenes: Making of The Love of Siam
- Concert featuring all the songs in the film, including a performance of "Gun Lae Gun" sung by the cast
- Music video of "Pieng Ter" (Only You)
- Trailer
- Meet and Greet with Witwisit Hiranyawongkul


Disk Region: ALL Regions



Runtime: 2 Hours 50 Minutes



Format: NTSC
